KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Credits, Fixed
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records a single fixed number of credits that are awarded if the student passes the course.

KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Credits, Multiple
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records multiple numbers of credits that can be awarded for this course.

KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Credits, Variable
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records a range of number of credits that can be awarded for this course.

KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Final Grade
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records that a final grade is a result for this course

KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Degree
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records a degree is awarded if the student completes the program

KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Overall GPA
KSLR_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records the overall GPA of a student in a program
